page.description: The A5.SET_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all sets in the database.

prototypes.prototype: Set_List as C = :A5.SET_ENUM( [ options as N ] )
Next_Set_Name as C = :A5.SET_ENUM( lastname as C )

argument.name: Set_List
argument.description: A list of sets in various formats, depending on the Flag variable.

argument.name: Next_Set_Name
argument.description: The next set the list of sets.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of a set.
